name: flodey bird (evil flappy bird brother) by OmarXAlgamed
name_original: flodey bird (evil flappy bird brother) by OmarXAlgamed
description:
This game I made in order to try, learn and see my skills in making games in the Judot game engine, and this is the story of the game below here                                     

 

Story: Do you think that the maker of Flappy Bird game has banned it because people are addicted to it only? Definitely not because Flappy Bird's evil brother is the one who destroyed Flappy Bird's world, and now Flappy Bird is trying to kill his brother and fix the world, and you, the player, are trying to save the evil brother, Flodey Bird:
